__e: The doctor's gone to make a trade, and we both know he'll come back empty-handed, and then...
You come to me empty-handed and you want my help?
I couldn't go home... empty-handed... and let him have you... the money... and everything.
Don't chase a garbage truck down the street with a bag full of your mother's empties? No.
All I hear is talk of men who know not of the truth.
Is something wrong with every empty chair in this room?
If I go back empty-handed, it's over for you.
His life had to be fouled up. He had to have nothing in order to achieve so much.
You didn't come here empty-handed in order to eat the meat, right?
